price: Na katika khabari za A'di tulipo wapelekea upepo wa kukata uzazi.
arabic: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلۡعَقِيمَ
footnotes: Na katika kisa cha A'di yamo mawaidha pia. Tulipo wapelekea upepo usio kuwa na kheri yoyote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wafī ʿādin idh arsalnā ʿalayhimu al-rīḥa al-ʿaqīma
